name: html-links-checker
description: Tools to validate HTML link in the text editor. Result are shown in the 'Problems' tab

html-links-checker.requestMethod.description: Specifies the method used to send the URL request.

html-links-checker.localDomain.description: Specifies the local domain name to add to relative links starting with a slash (/). Must include de protocol.

html-links-checker.excludedDomains.description: Specifies all domains to not check (without protocol). Example: google.com

html-links-checker.validateExternalLinkA.description: Specifies if accessibility for external link must be validated

html-links-checker.externalLinkText.description: Specifies string that should be included in external link text to be accessible

html-links-checker.showProtocolRedirecti.description: Specifies if a warning is displayed when the protocol has changed in URL redirection.

html-links-checker.showWwwRedirectionWar.description: Specifies if a warning is displayed when the WWW has changed in URL redirection.
